item.title: Web Bluetooth to MQTT Gateway with Puck.js
item.description: If you read A little bit of Web Bluetooth you’ll know a bit about Puck.js and the new Web Bluetooth API already. But what, aside from building a gimmicky two factor authentication system, can you do with it? I had some ideas. What about an interface through which you can program multiple Pucks at the same time? The Web IDE allows you to connect and program one Puck at a time.
